## Discussion

If the content of the path root isn’t a well-formed Unicode string, this replaces invalid bytes with U+FFFD. See `String.init(decoding:)`.

# description

**Instance Property**

A textual representation of the path root.

## Declaration

```swift
var description: String { get }
```

## Discussion

If the content of the path root isn’t a well-formed Unicode string, this replaces invalid bytes with U+FFFD. See `String.init(decoding:)`.
title: description
